citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10;45 AM on
7/31/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone. The inspector arrived at the facility and there was
no answer at the call box. A phone call was made to the number listed in our database and a message was left letting
them know the inspector was at the facility and would wait at least 30 minutes. There was no reply received over the
required time period and the inspector left behind his contact information. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals,
and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement
action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10;45 AM on 
7/31/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone. The inspector arrived at the facility and there was 
no answer at the call box. A phone call was made to the number listed in our database and a message was left letting 
them know the inspector was at the facility and would wait at least 30 minutes. There was no reply received over the 
required time period and the inspector left behind his contact information. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, 
and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement 
action. 
 
 
End Section
